dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent report identifies potential issues with DDR voting but does not confirm the root cause as CM-related frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The report mentions DDR voting mechanisms but lacks a complete causal chain involving CM, CPU, and VCORE.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The report accurately identifies VCORE and DDR usage percentages but misses some CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical in ruling out MMDVFS but lacks depth in confirming the root cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes focus on DDR voting mechanisms, which are relevant but not comprehensive.
